messages.message:
The /experimental folder is now moved to a different repo.

It is now present in - https://github.com/instabase/experimental

1200 files removed
1413940 lines removed from monorepo.

:attention: The /experimental folder is now moved to a different repo.

It is now present in - https://github.com/instabase/experimental

Any one has experience is cleaning up git after a major tidy up ?
I do... but I need to do some refreshing of my memory lol
But happy to do so, because holy smokes that'll be a nice reduction in size I hope
There was some more than decent reduction by Jessica and serena as well. I dont think we ran any optimisation after that as well.

Not that I know of, no. There are some very powerful options available but they're... quirky. :joy:

I'll tinker a bit this evening perhaps and let you know!!

Am worried about the rewrite history part.

We should create a clone and play around with it
Yea that's my plan, I've done so in the past but it's never paid out dividends - but that was ~ a year ago, so it'll be different now I suspect
